response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product comes with a host of features that make it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe its true worth is well above $12,000. However, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
